detail.description: Welspun Enterprises Limited (WEL) , formerly known as Welspun Projects Ltd., is a part of the USD 2.7 billion Welspun Group. The Company operates in the infrastructure space with investments in oil & gas. In the infrastructure space, WEL is focused on the road and water sectors. While the Company’s main focus is on Hybrid Annuity Model (HAM) projects as a developer, it also takes up value accretive projects in the BOT-Toll and EPC space. [1]
